description: With AI bots increasingly scraping sites for training data, Cloudflare is upgrading its blocking tool so site owners can stop them and return custom responses. Read more...
title: Cloudflare's AI Crawl Control exits beta with support for customizable 402 responses

description: YouTube announced it's testing a new feature to make money and engage the audience during live streams. Read more...
title: YouTube is testing a new way for creators to make money through gifts

description: Battlefield 6 requires Secure Boot as a part of its anti-cheat measures, and a developer has now commented on how the team feels about the measures. Read more...
title: Battlefield 6 developer also wishes Secure Boot requirement wasn't needed

description: ChromeOS M139 users experiencing login problems can expect a fix soon, but Google has shared two workarounds you can use right now. Read more...
title: Google offers temporary fixes for ChromeOS device login failures

description: Microsoft has decided to kill off the Mobile Plans app in Windows, and revealed plans to migrate the process to the web, while integrating with the Windows 11 Settings app. Read more...
title: Microsoft is killing off the Mobile Plans app in Windows

description: Elden Ring Nightreign is soon receiving a brand-new mode expanding the endgame experience, and it's specifically made for "seasoned players." Read more...
title: FromSoftware is adding a new, even tougher, game mode to Elden Ring Nightreign

description: Apple will launch a new pair of wireless earbuds later this year under its Beats sub-brand. The company has dropped a new teaser. Read more...
title: Apple teases new wireless earbuds Powerbeats Fit for a 2025 launch

description: Drive inventory reports were limited to weekly schedules before, but Google has now added a daily option for eligible users. Read more...
title: Google adds daily exports to Drive inventory reporting

description: OpenAI has launched gpt-realtime, its latest speech-to-speech model, offering higher accuracy, improved instruction-following, and more natural-sounding voices. Read more...
title: OpenAI unveils gpt-realtime, its most advanced and cheaper Speech-to-Speech model

description: Upgrade your Windows OS and enjoy a more enhanced UI, better multitasking, and improved security for a fraction of the normal cost. Read more...
title: Deal alert: Windows 11 Home or Pro license down to just $9.97

description: AI browsers are on the rise, but Vivaldi is taking a stand, explaining why it won't add generative AI like Google and Microsoft have. Read more...
title: Vivaldi slams Google and Microsoft for cramming AI into browsers, says it won't follow

description: Saber is planning another year of content updates for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, bringing new maps, missions, weapons, cosmetics, and much more. Read more...
title: Space Marine 2's biggest update ever lands next week to kick off Year Two of content

description: Backup, restore, transfer, and manage your iPhone data without iTunes for free before the offer expires. Read more...
title: DearMob iPhone Manager for PC/Mac ($79.95 value) free license giveaway

description: Anthropic is making a rather major change to its terms and conditions by allowing Claude to be trained on your chats, if you consent. Read more...
title: Anthropic wants Claude to get smarter by poking around in your chats

description: Microsoft has unveiled its first major in-house AI models, MAI-Voice-1 and MAI-1-preview, signaling a strategic move to reduce its dependence on OpenAI. Read more...
title: Microsoft reveals two in-house AI models: MAI-Voice-1 and MAI-1-preview

description: The 50-inch Hisense QD7 Series Smart Fire TV is now selling at its lowest-ever price, so check it out! Read more...
title: This big QD7 series Hisense UHD Smart Fire TV has dropped to its lowest price

description: Microsoft has shared a comprehensive list of all the new capabilities introduced in Teams during the month of August 2025. Read more...
title: Here are all the new features Microsoft added to Teams in August 2025

description: The newly released system requirements for the PC version of Battlefield 6 ask for an RTX 2060 even for playing at 1080p 30FPS at low settings. Read more...
title: Battlefield 6 PC system requirements are here, wants at least an RTX 2060 to play at 30FPS

description: The next Minecraft update is focused almost entirely on giving Copper new uses. Matching the contents, a brand-new name has been attached to it now. Read more...
title: Minecraft's copper-focused update now has an official name

description: The 2TB WD_BLACK SN7100 PCIe Gen4 NVMe Internal gaming solid-state drive has dropped to its all-time low price. Read more...
title: 2TB WD_BLACK SN7100 PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD drops to its lowest price ever

description: Five games are a part of the Free Play Days promotion on Xbox this weekend, offering EA's latest College Football game, the newly released game The Knightling, and much more. Read more...
title: EA Sports College Football 26, The Knightling and more join Free Play Days this weekend

description: Microsoft is rolling out more features to its Xbox platforms as a part of the August Update, including an upgraded play history, better gamepad controls on the Xbox PC app, and more. Read more...
title: Xbox August Update carries better controls for PC app, cross-device play history, and more

description: Nvidia has released a new graphics driver with optimizations for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants and Wuthering Waves. Read more...
title: Nvidia driver 581.15 adds Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants support

description: The Epic Games Store is back with another giveaway. This time, it offers PC gamers Machinarium and Make Way. Read more...
title: Machinarium and Make Way are free to claim on the Epic Games Store

description: If you have Amazon Prime, you can get this Nvidia RTX 5080 graphics card at its MSRP without any markup. Read more...
title: Nvidia RTX 5080 is now available at MSRP for Amazon Prime members

description: GitHub pages with over a thousand lines of code are rendering extremely slow on Apple Safari while working perfectly fine on other browsers like Chrome and Edge, and operating systems like Windows 11. Read more...
title: GitHub has become painfully slow on Apple Safari

description: At its event today in London, Honor officially launched the thin and premium-looking MagicPad3 tablet in the country. Read more...
title: Honor launches MagicPad3 tablet in the UK with a premium design

description: Honor has announced its MagicBook Art 14 laptop, a thin, high-end laptop with plenty of RAM and storage. Read more...
title: Honor's MagicBook Art 14 (2025) arrives in Europe with premium features

description: Honor has launched the Magic V5 premium foldable smartphone for customers in the UK and the EU. It was already made available in some Asian markets, now more people can buy it. Read more...
title: Honor Magic V5 launches in the UK and EU with a massive battery

description: Nvidia's cloud gaming platform GeForce NOW is adding support for seven more PC games this week, including Microsoft's latest first-party release from the Gears of War series. Read more...
title: Gears of War: Reloaded and six more games gain GeForce NOW support this week

description: 34 inches, fast refresh rate, OLED, nearly instant response time, and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro, all of that for just $549. Read more...
title: This massive gaming OLED monitor is now available for just $549

description: Acer has released its 2024 Sustainability Report, and it shows that the company has reached 60% renewable energy and remains on track to reach 100% by 2035. Read more...
title: Acer hits renewable electricity goal ahead of schedule

description: A cybersecurity firm has found some AI chats being leaked to the open web. Disturbingly, it found that users were engaging in child sexual abuse with the AI. Read more...
title: AI fantasy chatbots leak explicit user data, including child sexual abuse messages

description: Microsoft is planning to make Copilot even smarter in the coming months, allowing it to integrate with more of your workflows. Read more...
title: Microsoft is teaching Copilot new tricks

description: Porsche is introducing games to its cars in partnership with AirConsole, which can be played without needing any additional hardware. Read more...
title: Porsche launches new in-car gaming experience with AirConsole

description: WhatsApp is working on more timer options for disappearing messages. It's planning to add a 1-hour timer and a 12-hour timer, but there is a catch. Read more...
title: WhatsApp to add 1-hour disappearing message option, but there's a catch

description: OpenAI has launched a new Codex extension for VS Code and its forks, allowing developers to use the AI coding agent directly within their IDE. Read more...
title: OpenAI Codex gets a major update, now also available as a VS Code extension

description: NVIDIA announced impressive second-quarter earnings with $46.7 billion in revenue, a 56% year-over-year increase, driven primarily by its Blackwell Data Center platform. Read more...
title: NVIDIA reports $46.7 Billion in revenue despite no H20 sales to China
